snippet: Coke’s second-quarter profit dropped to $2.79 billion from $2.8 billion a year ago as ingredient prices rose and sales declined 4 percent in Europe.
abstract: Coca-Cola Company reports that its second quarter profit edged lower, to $2.79 billion, or $1.21 a share, compared with $2.8 billion, or $1.20 a share a year earlier; revenue grew 3 percent, to $13.09 billion; company says it continues to be performing well in a challenging global economy.
lead_paragraph: Coke’s second-quarter profit dropped to $2.79 billion from $2.8 billion a year ago as ingredient prices rose and sales declined 4 percent in Europe.

headline.main: Coca-Cola Sales Rise 3%; Profit Falls Slightly
headline.print_headline: Coca-Cola Sales Rise 3%; Profit Falls Slightly
